name: Check if a new store can be created on the best buy store api
id: testing-different-request-on-the-best-buy-api:Check if a new store can be created on the best buy store api

testSteps.description: When I send a POST request to stores endpoint with the information name "Matlab" type "T8" address "Sherman" address2 "Sherman Avenue" city "Los Angeles" state "California" zip "98568" lat "33.584" lng "114.587" hours "Mon-Sat 8.00am to 8.00pm" service1 "service id" service2 "Not available"

children.description: Creating store with name: Matlab, type: T8, address: Sherman, address2: Sherman Avenue, city: Los Angeles, state: California, zip: 98568, lat: 33.584, lng: 114.587, hours: Mon-Sat 8.00am to 8.00pm, services: {service id=Not available}
